front.title: NIST backscattering-correction-factor database for auger electron spectroscopy

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This database provides backscattering correction factors of homogeneous solids for quantitative surface analyses by Auger electron spectroscopy.

seriesInfo.name: NIST NSRDS; NSRDS-NIST; National standard reference data series
